title: nemisis draft?
body: Has nemisis draft been added in yet? I been waiting hours now but it has not shown up.

replies.body: For NA, rotating game mode would be starting later in the afternoon (on Fridays).  Our schedule is up on our [rotating game mode](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/rotating-game-mode-queue-now-live-16) page.  Hope that clears things up, and have loads of fun!
that page doesnt really help since its not for nemisis, doesnt really give a good time zone when it should be up, only gives dates of modes

The image on that page shows that Nemesis Draft is 8/19 to 8/22.  Hexakill will be coming in the week after.  I appreciate the feedback and will use the image to help!
https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/august/rgm-a/RGM_WeeklyModeForecast_Hero_Ascension.jpg
not to sound rude but the question was asking a time not a date, its 8/19 now so a decent time frame would be great......

Not rude, I understand wanting specifics and a clear cut answer!  My initial answer is exactly what we have; roughly in the afternoonper our[ Rotating Game Mode FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210354503-Rotating-Game-Modes-FAQ) -- local time per region.  I don't have a specific time to provide, but the event starts roughly in the afternoon on Fridays and ends early on Monday mornings.

Oh how it would be nice if riot put a start time in there.. /sigh
